channel.title: Trump on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Trump on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Samantha Bee Laments ‘Late Show’ Cancellation: “It’s Awful”
item.description: In a podcast interview, the comedian says she feels for her former ‘Daily Show’ co-star Stephen Colbert.

item.title: Samantha Bee Laments ‘Late Show’ Cancellation: “It’s Awful”
item.description: In a podcast interview, the comedian says she feels for her former ‘Daily Show’ co-star Stephen Colbert.

item.title: Trump claims Europe won’t make Big Tech pay ISPs; EU says it still might
item.description: EC spokesperson denies network-fee issue is settled, says it must be legislated.

item.title: Trump admin. is muffling CDC’s flagship health journal, report finds
item.description: CDC’s MMWR is publishing much less, and sources say studies now require RFK Jr.’s sign-off.

item.title: Court rules Trump broke US law when he fired Democratic FTC commissioner
item.description: Supreme Court precedent protects FTC commissioner, at least “for the time being.”

item.title: Trump’s claims of a Coca-Cola agreement quickly go flat as nutritionists groan
item.description: Whichever sweetener is used, Coke is still crammed with sugar.

item.title: Trump admin to finally cap price of weird bandages that cost $10 billion last year
item.description: Trump administration has delayed a Biden-era fix twice, but is now set to cap price.

item.title: Federal Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump Administration’s Immigration Raids in Los Angeles
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the Trump administration from conducting indiscriminate immigration enforcement raids in Los Angeles to detain people based solely on race, ethnicity, language

item.title: Federal Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump Administration’s Immigration Raids in Los Angeles
item.description: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the Trump administration from conducting indiscriminate immigration enforcement raids in Los Angeles to detain people based solely on race, ethnicity, language
